(5023x243+211)/64 mod 128 = 3. (5023x729+697)/128 mod 64 = 5. (5023x2187+2219)/256 mod 32 = 8. (5023x2187+2219)/512 mod 16 = 4. (5023x2187+2219)/1024 mod 8 = 2. (5023x2187+2219)/2048 mod 4 = 1. (5023x6561+8705)/4096 mod 2 = 0. (5023x6561+8705)/8192 mod 1 = 0.
